#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int val[n+2];
		for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) {
			cin>>val[i];
		}
		int ans = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			ans += val[i] / (i+1);
			//if(val[i] % (i + 1) != 0)  ans++;
		}
		if(ans % 2 == 0) {
			cout<<"BOB\n";
		} else {
			cout<<"ALICE\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
